title.rendered: No more Frizz Keratin and Charcoal relaxing special @luxeconceptsalon

content.rendered:
During January and February humidity is at its worst . To help you fight the frizz. Luxe concept salon have a super smooth Special in the latest innovations in the the finest hair relaxing treatments available. Choose from either Keratin or Charcoal smoothing therapy.

  • Lasts between 2-4 months
  • Have smooth shiny and frizz free the day you leave the salon.
  • Keratin
  • No fumes irritation or discomfort

*Note you must colour your hair one week after any treatments as they will cause colours to fade. Luxe accepts no responsibility as to what degree

  • $150 for short (chin length ) hair
  • $200 for Medium (too the shoulders length) hair
  • $250 for Long (past shoulders length) Hair.

Subject to availability and with selected specialist only
